mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hoover Dam Memorial to Labor, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hansen, Oskar J. W. F. (Norwegian-American sculptor, 1892-1971) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Hansen's sculpture, set into the rock canyon wall on the Arizona side is a memorial to those who constructed the dam, including the 96 workers who died during construction. the central inscription reads: "They died to make the desert bloom." [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
